# üõí Flux de travail de g√©n√©ration de leads : Scraping Yelp & Trustpilot + Analyse OpenAI via BrightData

## üìã Aper√ßu

Ce flux de travail fournit une solution automatis√©e de g√©n√©ration de leads qui identifie des prospects de haute qualit√© sur Yelp et Trustpilot, analyse leur cr√©dibilit√© √† travers les avis et envoie des e-mails de sensibilisation personnalis√©s. Parfait pour les agences de marketing num√©rique, les √©quipes de vente et les professionnels du d√©veloppement commercial.

## üîÑ Comment √ßa fonctionne

## üìä Sortie de donn√©es

| Champ         | Description                      | Exemple                          |

## üöÄ Instructions de configuration

**‚è±Ô∏è Temps de configuration estim√© : 10‚Äì15 minutes**

### √âtape 2 : Configurer l'int√©gration Google Sheets

### √âtape 3 : Configurer BrightData

4. Testez les connexions

### √âtape 4 : Configurer les mod√®les d'IA

- **Google Gemini (Analyse de localisation)**

### √âtape 5 : Configurer l'int√©gration Gmail

### √âtape 6 : Tester et activer

## üìñ Guide d'utilisation

## üîß Options de personnalisation

## üìà Cas d'utilisation et exemples

### 1. G√©n√©ration de leads pour une agence de marketing num√©rique

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

workflow.name: Lead Workflow: Yelp & Trustpilot Scraping + OpenAI Analysis via BrightData

parameters.content:
Make a Copy of This Google Sheet.

(https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hX0MD_BLVWuEaXwOjKtwrWsjsBzc32ZtFVjP7wVGQYI/edit?usp=drive_link)

Optimized Workflow Summary:
This automation identifies high-quality leads from Yelp and Trustpilot based on a user-submitted location and business category. It uses AI to break down the area into sub-locations, scrapes business details via BrightData, checks credibility through Trustpilot reviews, and stores the best matches in Google Sheets. Finally, AI generates personalized outreach emails, which are automatically sent via Gmail ‚Äî enabling fully automated lead generation and email marketing with zero manual effort.
